definitions.definition: Something which is related to, or in some way affects , a fact or event .
examples: The report should focus on to the current circumstances of the organisation, to help us find a way to grow in the future.
She went missing in somewhat spooky circumstances .

definitions.definition: An event; a fact; a particular incident , occurrence , or condition ( status ).
Condition in regard to worldly estate; state of property ; situation; surroundings.
examples: She was born into comfortable circumstances .

main_definition: Something which is related to, or in some way affects , a fact or event .
secondary_definitions: An event; a fact; a particular incident , occurrence , or condition ( status ).
( archaic ) Evasive or indirect language; circumlocution .
Condition in regard to worldly estate; state of property ; situation; surroundings.
